title: DOWNTOWN CHERRY CREEK 1 Bed 7 min to LoDo LoHi RiNo Union Station RiNo
posting_body: ['Welcome to Cherry Creek 1 Bedroom Deal!', 'Call / TEXT for person Showings ASAP!', 'Sleek, modern apartments offer a range of floor plans including studio, one and two-bedroom options with granite countertops, cozy electric fireplaces, and mountain views.', 'This pet-friendly apartment home gives you everything you want and need in your next home.', 'In-home washers and dryers to granite countertops, these apartment interiors combine all the most important features.', 'Around the community, you can find a year-round resort style pool and walking and biking trails nearby, making living even better beyond your front door.', 'Ideally located on South Jackson Street in Denver, the community provides you access to dining, shopping, arts, entertainment and recreation.', "You're minutes from Cherry Creek Shopping Center and the Denver Country Club, moments from major hospitals and the University of Denver, and walking distance to the sprawling green spaces at Burns and Pulaski parks and the bike paths and waterways along Cherry Creek Trail.", 'Schedule your tour today and see why living here is the best of Denver.', '* Swimming Pool and Spa with Wi-Fi', '* Outdoor Fireplace and Lounge', '* Two Picnic Areas', '* Community Barbecue Grills', '* Direct Access Parking Garage', '* Controlled Access Garage', '* Black and Stainless Steel Energy Star GE Appliances', '* Full-sized Stackable Washer and Dryer in the Home', '* Wood-Style Flooring', '* Generous Pantry with Adjustable Shelves', '* Electric Fireplace*', '* Bedroom Blackout Shades*', '* Energy-Efficient, Double-Paned Insulated Windows', '* Ceiling fans*', '* Granite Countertop Kitchen Islands*', '*', 'Soaking Tub in Master Bathroom', '* Oversized Walk-in Closets* with Custom Shelving', '* Covered Private Patio or Terrace', '* Mountain and Courtyard Views*', 'Call or Text to set up your showing', '*Restrictions Apply.', 'Pricing, availability and lease terms subject to change anytime!']
